## Sample
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
```


Import Data
```{r}
df <- read.csv("/Users/jennytran/Documents/GitHub/smoc-project/data/SMOCDemoGCA.xlsx - SMOCDemoGCA.csv")
```

Select Variables of interest to your study and save to new dataframe
```{r}
df1 <- df[c('person_id','Day','chat_room_id','z.participation',
 'z.social.impact',
 'z.overall.responsivity',
 'z.internal.cohesion',
 'z.newness',
 'z.comm.density', 'Sex')]
```

Report on the total observations in the data
```{r}
dim(df1)
```

Report on the valid observations in each variable
```{r}
glimpse(df1)
```

Subset the data to include valid cases only and save to a new data frame
```{r}
df1 <- na.omit(df1)
```

Report the final sample
```{r}
dim(df1)
```
